Description: Rim sherd of Chian Simple Animal Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior: reserved band at rim, glazed streaky black below; traces of lotus flower in added white outline and added red centre; top of rim glazed; exterior, mostly worn; part of dot band at rim between dilute lines, reserved below; inscription on exterior.
Bibliographic references: Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (pl. 21.1.45)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0966) (phase 2)
